ComicInfo.Title: Peace on Earth
ComicInfo.Summary: Peace on Earth: Balder becomes ruler of Asgard. Thor decides to head for Midgard. Recently released convict Thug Thatcher kills the wrong man and becomes the new Zaniac.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:14:49. [Issue ID 41847]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Warriors Three [Hogun,Thor,Justice Peace (introduction),Frigga,Balder,Sif,Beta Ray Bill,Hela,Fandral,Thug Thatcher (becomes new Zaniac),Killen (first appearance and death),Ruby (death),Brad Wolfe (death),Volstagg],Zaniac
